issue.title: Gazebo crash at launch with a "Host not found"

content.raw:
boost::filesystem version 2 has been removed in default. There are also two new environment variables: GAZEBO_IP and GAZEBO_HOSTNAME. You can set these to  force Gazebo into reporting a specific IP or HOSTNAME.

GAZEBO_HOSTNAME is the trump card, followed by GAZEBO_IP. If neither environment variable are set, then Gazebo uses the default ip/hostname lookup.
content.html:
boost::filesystem version 2 has been removed in default. There are also two new environment variables: GAZEBO_IP and GAZEBO_HOSTNAME. You can set these to force Gazebo into reporting a specific IP or HOSTNAME.

GAZEBO_HOSTNAME is the trump card, followed by GAZEBO_IP. If neither environment variable are set, then Gazebo uses the default ip/hostname lookup.
